Summary Note:
Hanna Peltola and the RM met at a networking event in Helsinki. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Having worked for over 23 years, Hanna Peltola brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Hanna Peltola and Piirainen tied the knot in 2012. Their children are named Turunen, Salo and Uusitalo.
Education Background:
Hanna graduated from Meilahden Yläaste ja Lukio in 1996.
Hanna completed her university studies at Metropolia University of Applied Sciences in 2002.
Occupation History:
Hanna Peltola is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
In 2002, Hanna Peltola started working as a Research Scientist at Receptal Oy, marking the beginning of her successful career.
In 2007, she moved to Finnish Red Cross Blood Service to work as a Biotech Startup Founder, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2011 to 2024, she served as a CEO at Finnish Red Cross Blood Service, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 410000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns 2 exceptional properties: condo located in Oulu, valued at approximately 635,000.00 EUR, flat located in Hämeenlinna, valued at approximately 840,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Hämeenlinna and Oulu.
In 2009, she received an inheritance of 4680000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Real Estate Developer, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
